short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a name search on the salesforce flows screen in lightning and auto scroll to reveal all flows in the list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a Flow Name search on the Salesforce flows screen (lightning only) and auto scroll to reveal all flows in the list. No more having to scroll through pages to get the flow you want and easy search.
